title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: Mitch Liu and Jieyi Long founded Theta Network in 2018. It offers video, media, and entertainment infrastructure through its Web3 technologies. As part of its governance system, Theta offers its own native cryptocurrency token, THETA.Binance, Kucoin, Huobi Global, Gate.io are some of the top cryptocurrency exchanges for trading Theta Network (THETA).                                                                                                                                                                                                    Theta Network (Theta) Price Prediction 2022A price swing occurred at $1.832 resistance2 to $1.491 resistance1 for Theta Network (THETA) after it touched support levels of $1.141 and $1.006. The price has reversed from the $1.141 support level and is now moving sideways and is expected to remain bullish for the foreseeable future. Meanwhile, we predict THETA’s long-term price will stay bullish since it cannot break through the current support level anytime soon. We can expect THETA to reach $5 in 2022.

comments.author: john1010
comments.body: Quote from: Ragavendra Raja on September 08, 2022, 11:11:02 AMMitch Liu and Jieyi Long founded Theta Network in 2018. It offers video, media, and entertainment infrastructure through its Web3 technologies. As part of its governance system, Theta offers its own native cryptocurrency token, THETA.Binance, Kucoin, Huobi Global, Gate.io are some of the top cryptocurrency exchanges for trading Theta Network (THETA).                                                                                                                                                                                                    Theta Network (Theta) Price Prediction 2022A price swing occurred at $1.832 resistance2 to $1.491 resistance1 for Theta Network (THETA) after it touched support levels of $1.141 and $1.006. The price has reversed from the $1.141 support level and is now moving sideways and is expected to remain bullish for the foreseeable future. Meanwhile, we predict THETA’s long-term price will stay bullish since it cannot break through the current support level anytime soon. We can expect THETA to reach $5 in 2022.If I'm not mistaken, Theta Network has also developed a Game similar to Mobile Legend and another game platform, I tried to play I think the name of the game is Tethan Arena, it is a good game platform. I hope that Theta will be listed on top of the market cap. But it needs more exposure for this project to catch the attention of big investors.

comments.author: cryptobadshah
comments.body: Theta network is blockchain powered video streaming network It's one of the blockchain projects seeking to change how consumers consume and generate video content the network is appealing to creators customers and investors the theta goals and infrastructure development suggest that its toke price will rise investors see the network and the coin's potential things should improve after comprehensive forecasting and analytical analysis and we believe the theta price will cross again 5$ in 2023 and i hope the price go forward to touch in all time high if the bull trend is begain and run , then to see you the theta price in start in 2023 maybe touch in 9 to 10$.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: That's impossible prediction for now. The price of theta may go even lower than one dollar. How can it will even reach $5 at the end of this year? are you doing your prediction accurately or what? no bull market means everything will be staying at the same place like this. Crypto will not be moving to the somewhere. It will remain in the same possition until a few years later once bitcoin done with another halving.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: the current price is actually down at $1.04 , I also think it's just a prediction and analysis isn't it, so it could be right or wrong, so back again we are just waiting for the market to be bullish because all cryptocurrencies will be bullish when the bitcoin price is also bullish , so you can buy it cheap now $1 or $0.95

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: For 2022? Almost impossible because the last time Theta price is on 5$ mark was Bitcoin is around 30K but now the market seems more bearish while your target is x5 from the current price and only 3 months left for 2022.  Although Theta is a good project because it focus on entertainment industry but the main problem is the general sentiment of crypto which is stopping it to grow further to the level that you are speculating on this thread.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: In my opinion if this coin will be going down to the another bottom. You're too optimistic about the price of this coin. Theta was not a popular coin anymore. It's hard to be pumped during the bearish market like this. I think that anyone aware about what happened with market. Are you still expecting theta to go to the 5 times from the current price? believe me if that doesn't even make sense
